channel.title: Comments on: Diablo Resurrected – Strange visual glitch on PS4 ( Look at darker section below statue, the Black and Grey squares ). These are all over the screen and very distracting in darker areas.

item.title: By: OpticalPrime35
item.dc:creator: OpticalPrime35
item.description:
In this picture just look in the darker areas around the fog. You'll see the squares pretty easily.
They are static while you move around so it gives the picture a very muddy / strange look when moving.
Not sure what this is but it is something I thought I saw in an earlier section but it was very dim and one of those things that makes you wonder if you are just seeing things. But now I'm in this area and they are very noticeable and very distracting.
No this does not show up in Legacy mode
item.content:encoded:
In this picture just look in the darker areas around the fog. You’ll see the squares pretty easily.

They are static while you move around so it gives the picture a very muddy / strange look when moving.

Not sure what this is but it is something I thought I saw in an earlier section but it was very dim and one of those things that makes you wonder if you are just seeing things. But now I’m in this area and they are very noticeable and very distracting.

No this does not show up in Legacy mode

item.title: By: MFDOOMY
item.dc:creator: MFDOOMY
item.description: Looks like its just the floors continuing on, I've never played this game but I feel like this is intended for whatever reason. That reason I can't give you because I haven't played!
item.content:encoded: Looks like its just the floors continuing on, I’ve never played this game but I feel like this is intended for whatever reason. That reason I can’t give you because I haven’t played!
